creator: yxue24@uwo.ca
text:
When installing apache_2.2.3-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi, at the step "Please enter
your server's information", if you go directly to next step, the installer will
not remind you that you must have a server domain name. However, if you go to
the next step "Choose the setup type" without entering anything, and then go
back, and go next again, the installer will remind you that the domain name
entry cannot be left blank. Before you enter something for the domain name, you
cannot continue the installation.

It is a flaw in validation check for entering the domain name.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: *** Bug 42078 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 40096 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: wrowe@apache.org
wrowe@apache.org
text:
This is solved for future 2.2.7/2.0.62 releases, thank you for catching
and reporting this flaw!
